entry.string: Configuration
entry.translation: Cunffeegooreshun

entry.string: Global Settings
entry.translation: Glubel Setteengs

entry.string: Stores the output generated by Xaraya in a cache for low latency/low overhead serving.
entry.translation: Stures zee ooootpoot genereted by Xereya in a ceche-a fur loo letency/loo ooferheed serfeeng.

entry.string: Enable the Output Caching System:
entry.translation: Eneble-a zee Ooootpoot Cecheeng System:

entry.string: Config options can be modified, but no output caching will happen until enabled.
entry.translation: Cunffeeg oopshuns cun be-a mudeeffied, boot nu ooootpoot cecheeng veell heppee unteel inebled.

entry.string: Output caching is disabled.
entry.translation: Oootpoot cecheeng is deesebled. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: If not sure, select the default theme.
entry.translation: Iff nut soore-a, select zee deffoolt zeeme-a.

entry.string: Cache the Output of this Theme:
entry.translation: Ceche-a zee Ooootpoot ooff thees Zeeme-a:

entry.string: Limits the disk usage of the output cache to the specified number of megabytes.
entry.translation: Leemits zee deesk usege-a ooff zee ooootpoot ceche-a tu zee speceeffied noomber ooff megebytes.

entry.string: Cache Size Limit (in MB):
entry.translation: Ceche-a Seeze-a Leemit (in MB):

entry.string: Page Output Cache Settings
entry.translation: Pege-a Ooootpoot Ceche-a Setteengs

entry.string: If enabled, the pages generated by Xaraya are cached for reuse.
entry.translation: Iff inebled, zee peges genereted by Xereya ere-a ceched fur reoose-a.

entry.string: Enable Page Output Caching:
entry.translation: Eneble-a Pege-a Ooootpoot Cecheeng:

entry.string: The maximum lifetime of a cached page. Set to zero for no time based expiration.
entry.translation: Zee mexeemoom leeffetime-a ooff a ceched pege-a. Set tu zeru fur nu teeme-a besed ixpureshun.

entry.string: Page Cache Expiration Time (in hh:mm:ss):
entry.translation: Pege-a Ceche-a Ixpureshun Teeme-a (in hh:mm:ss):

entry.string: If selected, individual item display pages will be cached.
entry.translation: Iff selected, indeefidooel item deespley peges veell be-a ceched. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Cache Item Display Pages:
entry.translation: Ceche-a Item Deespley Peges:

entry.string: If selected, the cache will be invalidated when new comments are posted for an item.
entry.translation: Iff selected, zee ceche-a veell be-a infeleedeted vhee noo cumments ere-a pusted fur un item.

entry.string: Flush Cached Display Page on New Comment:
entry.translation: Floosh Ceched Deespley Pege-a oon Noo Cumment:

entry.string: If selected, the cache will be invalidated when a rating is posted for an item.
entry.translation: Iff selected, zee ceche-a veell be-a infeleedeted vhee a reteeng is pusted fur un item.

entry.string: Flush Cached Display Page on New Rating:
entry.translation: Floosh Ceched Deespley Pege-a oon Noo Reteeng:

entry.string: If selected, the cache will be invalidated when a vote is caste on a poll hooked to an item.
entry.translation: Iff selected, zee ceche-a veell be-a infeleedeted vhee a fute-a is ceste-a oon a pull huuked tu un item.

entry.string: Flush Cached Display Page on New Hooked Poll Vote:
entry.translation: Floosh Ceched Deespley Pege-a oon Noo Huuked Pull Fute-a:

entry.string: Adds a line to the bottom of cached pages stating the cache time.
entry.translation: Edds a leene-a tu zee buttum ooff ceched peges steteeng zee ceche-a teeme-a.

entry.string: Show the "Last Modified" Stamp on Cached Pages:
entry.translation: Shoo zee "Lest Mudeeffied" Stemp oon Ceched Peges:

entry.string: If enabled, xarCache will send Expires and Cache-Control headers to the client, encouraging the page to be cached locally
entry.translation: Iff inebled, xerCeche-a veell send Ixpures und Ceche-a-Cuntrul heeders tu zee cleeent, incuooregeeng zee pege-a tu be-a ceched lucelly

entry.string: Allow clients to reuse locally cached pages without re-validation:
entry.translation: Elloo cleeents tu reoose-a lucelly ceched peges veethuoot re-a-feleedeshun:

entry.string: Block Output Cache Settings
entry.translation: Bluck Ooootpoot Ceche-a Setteengs

entry.string: If enabled, block output will be cached for reuse. Please enable hooks to blocks for per instance configuration options.
entry.translation: Iff inebled, bluck ooootpoot veell be-a ceched fur reoose-a. Pleese-a ineble-a huuks tu blucks fur per instunce-a cunffeegooreshun oopshuns. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Enable Block Output Caching:
entry.translation: Eneble-a Bluck Ooootpoot Cecheeng:

entry.string: The maximum lifetime of a cached block. Set to zero for no time based expiration.
entry.translation: Zee mexeemoom leeffetime-a ooff a ceched bluck. Set tu zeru fur nu teeme-a besed ixpureshun.

entry.string: Block Cache Expiration Time (in hh:mm:ss):
entry.translation: Bluck Ceche-a Ixpureshun Teeme-a (in hh:mm:ss):
